Articles.Content:
![NHMTh1Q.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/NHMTh1Q.jpg)

**this is the docking station, crew quarters and the solar array for my station. This is the largest section and so i thought i would do it first. Its also too big to take by shuttle so i used my .... lifter.**

![Kx0qPHE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Kx0qPHE.jpg)

**Seperation. She Peels Like a Banana!**

![TgsvIQ3.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TgsvIQ3.jpg)

![aMPf56c.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/aMPf56c.jpg)

**The next part of the station is the first fuel tank of two**

![NuOJ075.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/NuOJ075.jpg)

![SOsdMgO.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/SOsdMgO.jpg)

**Here comes the second fuel tank, these are just small enough for a shuttle**

![YMAh2oN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/YMAh2oN.jpg)

![yT1joqs.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yT1joqs.jpg)

**The final piece** **I undock my two tugs, and send it to the science array**

![sxxslK8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sxxslK8.jpg)

**Probably should have parked the shuttle a bit closer**

![BE9gATc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BE9gATc.jpg)

**i seperate the two tugs, one for each side of the array**

![nvnAR2N.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nvnAR2N.jpg)

**After docking the two tugs to the array, i send it to dock with my station**

![nKf0kVe.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nKf0kVe.jpg)

**DONE!**

![tnVmji0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/tnVmji0.jpg)

**Glamour Shot!**
